body:
Comment 6: 
Tylor, right now we have no theories as to the cause.  If you have repro code we could
run or if you could bisect to find a good->bad range would be useful.  To clarify, which
is the last revision that crashed for you?  (Tip has been moving so fast the past few
weeks that saying "tip" is nearly useless for debugging this)

Thanks!
